content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to get hyperlinks from the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_languages_by_number_of_native_speakers. I also received two new commands from the user to get hyperlinks from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World and https://www.nationalgeographic.com/. However, my computer failed to execute the command to get hyperlinks due to too much output. The user then gave me a command to google popular programming languages, which returned a list of links. \n\nI received a new command from the user to browse the website https://www.tiobe.com/tiobe-index/ and gather information on the most popular programming languages. My computer executed the command and returned a list of the top programming languages according to the TIOBE Index for May 2023, which can be used to make strategic decisions about which language to adopt for new software systems.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Python C Java C++ C#"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.softwaretestinghelp.com/csharp-vs-cpp-vs-java/", "https://www.quora.com/What-should-I-learn-C++-C-Python-or-Java-etc", "https://www.tutorialspoint.com/cplusplus-vs-java-vs-python", "https://www.udemy.com/course/complete-codecamp-on-c-c-c-java-python-programming/", "https://www.sololearn.com/Discuss/2664022/python-c-or-java", "https://www.zonicgroup.com/java-javascript-python-c-c-top-programming-languages/", "https://www.perforce.com/products/klocwork", "https://www.w3schools.com/cs/index.php"]'}]
"""
